aboutMe.description: Hello, my name is Vitalij, and I am 30 years old. I am a frontend developer living in Lahr/Schwarzwald. Motivated by the limitless possibilities within IT, I look forward to creating visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMe.skill1: I am flexible regarding my work environment and can work effectively both on-site in Lahr/Schwarzwald and remotely.
aboutMe.skill2: I am open-minded and enjoy facing new challenges to continually enhance my knowledge and skills.
aboutMe.skill3: I view web application design as more than just programming; it is a creative approach to problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to transform complex technical challenges into appealing, user-friendly solutions. This is how I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skillSet.description: During my time at the Developer Academy, I acquired comprehensive knowledge and learned to use a range of front-end technologies and concepts; I have a strong command of multiple programming languages and am confident in working with different databases.
skillSet.text2: Please feel free to contact me. I look forward to contributing and expanding my knowledge.
skillSet.text3: I have a special interest in learning

projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.daBubble: A chat messenger app is inspired by Slack or Discord and allows users to communicate with each other through channels or direct messages.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.elPolloLoco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.pokedex: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
projects.sliderHeader: What my colleagues say about me
projects.content0: During your training, you were great at working with the team. Your ideas for the frontend really moved our project forward, and you were always open to feedback and new approaches. Working with you was a huge help for us!
projects.content1: Your contribution to our project was fantastic! Not only did you do a great job with your own tasks, but you also helped others integrate their parts into the system. Your openness to share knowledge and support others really pushed our team forward.
projects.content2: Your helpfulness and dedication really stood out. You explained complex topics in a way everyone could understand and were always there when someone in the team got stuck. Your open nature and expertise really brought us together.

contactMe.description: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
